SQL.ReadingCounts: SELECT c.`guid` ,c.`name` ,c.`description` ,c.`serial` ,c.`channel` ,c.`unit` ,t.`name` AS `type` ,t.`icon` ,FROM_UNIXTIME(u.`timestamp`) ,u.`readings` FROM ( SELECT `id`, MAX(`timestamp`) as `timestamp` ,COUNT(id) AS `readings` FROM `pvlng_reading_num` GROUP BY `id` UNION SELECT `id` ,MAX(`timestamp`) ,COUNT(id) FROM `pvlng_reading_str` GROUP BY `id` ) AS u JOIN `pvlng_channel` AS c USING(`id`) JOIN `pvlng_type` AS t ON c.`type`= t.`id`
